title: Fire at Chemical Factory, Dombivli
summary: Major blaze reported at MIDC Phase 2. 4 units affected. Fire brigade on site.

title: Ransomware Attack on Regional Bank
summary: Services disrupted for 12 hours. Experts suspect LockBit variant.

title: Construction Site Accident
summary: Scaffolding collapse in North Delhi. Safety audit ordered.

title: Port Workers Strike
summary: Supply chain disruption expected due to indefinite strike.
